LANG.COMMON_MSG_NEED_SAVE_REBOOT: * New settings will only take effect after [Save & Reboot]
LANG.COMMON_ALERT_NEED_SAVE_REBOOT: Please [Save Reboot] the device to activate these settings.
LANG.REMOVE_FILE_ALERT: Do you want to delete this file?
LANG.WARNING_MSG_100: The device is rebooting. It might takes some minutes. Please reload the page then.
LANG.WARNING_MSG_101: The device is upgrading firmware. It might takes some minutes. Please reload the page then.
LANG.WARNING_MSG_102: The device is upgrading firmware of the motor driver controller. It might takes some minutes. Please reload the page then.
LANG.WARNING_MSG_103: The device is heating itself. It might takes some minutes. Please reload the page then.
LANG.SETTING_HOST_NAME_ERR:
Rules of network name
1. Only ASCII A~Z, a~z, 0~9, minus sign (-) and period (.) are allowed. 2. No blank or space characters are permitted as part of a name. 3. The last character must not be a minus sign or period. 4. Single character name is not allowed. 5. The first character is allowed to be either a letter or a digit.

LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_COUNTRY_DISCRIPTION: Use the two-letter code without punctuation for country, for examp: US or CA.Refer to
LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_STATE_PROVINCE_DISCRIPTION: do not abbreviate the state or province name, for example: California is for CA.
LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_LOCALITY_CITY_DISCRIPTION: do not abbreviate the city or town name, for example: Saint Louis is for St.
LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_COMPANY_DISCRIPTION: Comapny Name,only 0~9,a~z and A~Z are allowed
LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_ORGANIZATION_DISCRIPTION: The name of the department or organization unit making the request,0~9,a~z and A~Z are allowed
LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_COMMON_NAME_DISCRIPTION: The Host+Domain Name. It looks like "www.company.com" or "company.com".
LANG.SETTING_HTTPS_VALIDITY_DISCRIPTION: (1~9999 days). The valid period in days of certificate

LANG.SETTING_DDNS_SERVICE_ISP: As a service / As a protocol reference
LANG.SETTING_VIDEO_MOUNTING_TYPE_ERR: Error. You have to set Streaming Mode to Dual before you change Mounting Type
LANG.SETTING_FISHEYE_CALIBRATION_ERR: In order to Calibrate the Camera, please set the Video Application Mode to Preview. Set the encoder settings for Steam 1 to Fisheye, H.264, and 4000X3000. Click Apply for Each of these areas, and then return back to Camera Calibration to enable calibration

LANG.SETTING_IVS_DEFAULT_ZOOM_TRACKING: Use default zoom range for tracking

LANG.SETTING_VIDEO_N_GAIN_THRESHOLD: Switch from Day mode to Night mode

LANG.SETTING_VIDEO_PRESET_ERR: Please set preset points in live view page
LANG.HINT_MD_EXCLIDED_REGION: * : detect motion outside of motion region 1 ~ 9.
LANG.SETTING_MEDIA2_MSG: The Streaming Mode is "Single Streaming Mode",and the Media 2 will be disabled.
LANG.SETTING_MEDIA2_MASK_MSG: Warning.The privacy mask is not available in media 2 stream.Please disable privacy mask first.
LANG.SETTING_NIGHT_VIDEO_RESOLUTION: Change video resolution to 1920x1080 on video stream 1 when the camera enters night time mode.

LANG.GET_CONFIG_02: Always attach the server report when contacting your support channel.

LANG.ERROR_TO_DOWNLOAD_CENTER: Fail to connect to the download center

LANG.SETTING_PTZ_SAVE_HOME: Save current position as home position
LANG.PTZ_IDLE_POS_DESC: Return to a preset position after PTZ idle time
LANG.SETTING_DISABLE_EVENTS: Error. Please disable the event functions which they are associated to the recording function.
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_UNMOUNT_ALERT1: The storage media becomes not accessible.
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_UNMOUNT_ALERT2: Do you want to remove storage media?
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_MOUNT_ERR_MSG: Fail to mount storage media (might need to format it first).
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_UNMOUNT_MSG: Storage media can be safely removed now.
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_FORMAT_ALERT1: Warning! The data in the storage media will be lost.
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_FORMAT_ALERT2: Do you want to format storage media?
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_FORMAT_WAIT_MSG: It will take few minutes. Please DO NOT reboot or power off the device during format.
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_SCAN_WAIT_MSG: It will take few minutes. Please DO NOT reboot or power off the device during scan.
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_SETUP_MSG1: Remove old recordings when ran out of storage space automatically
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_SETUP_MSG2: Send a notification when the free storage space is lower than
LANG.SETTING_STORAGE_SETUP_HELP: Device is alerted when the free space is lower than this setting. To get this notification, you need to set the Event function. Please refer to Event configuration page.
LANG.DESC_STORAGE_EVENT_1: When the task of recording was triggered by continuous recording event named "Device boots completely", the firmware lists the DIs and Motion Detection statuses in the "Events" field. That helps user to search the specific event from the long recording period files.
LANG.DESC_STORAGE_EVENT_2: When the task of recording was triggered by the specific event like DIs, motion detection or scheduler, the firmware only lists the triggered event in the "Events" field associated with the given recording file. The other DIs and Motion Detection statuses within duration of recording file are NOT listed then.
LANG.ERROR_STEP1_MSG: download device log message and send to our technical support team.
LANG.ERROR_STEP2_MSG: Go one of following commands to reboot the device
LANG.ERROR_CMD3: Perform factory default but keep current networking settngs and reboot
LANG.HINT_SET_DO_HIGH: Set DO port to output high level
LANG.HINT_SET_DO_LOW: Set DO port to output low level
LANG.SETTING_NETWORK_NAME_ERR:
Rules of network name
1. Only ASCII A~Z, a~z, 0~9, minus sign (-), underscore (_) and period (.) are allowed.
2. No blank or space characters are permitted as part of a name.
3. The last character must not be a minus sign, underscore or period.
4. The first character is allowed to be either a letter or a digit.
5. No NULL string is allowed
LANG.SETTING_LOGIN_NAME_ERR:
Rules of login name
1. Only A~Z, a~z, 0~9, @, !, ^, minus sign (-), underscore (_), period (.) and $ are allowed.
2. The first character is allowed to be A~Z, a~z or 0~9 only.
LANG.SETTING_LOGIN_PWD_ERR:
Rules of login password
1. Allow 0~9 A~Z a~z
2. Allow special characters ! $ ( ) * + - . ; < = > @ [ ] ^ _ { } | ~
LANG.SETTING_GENERAL_URI_ERR:
Rules of network name
1. Only ASCII A~Z, a~z, 0~9, minus sign (-), underscore (_), period (.) and space ( ) are allowed.
2. The last character must not be a minus sign, underscore, period or space.
3. The first character is allowed to be either a letter or a digit.
4. NULL string is allowed
LANG.SETTING_PPPOE_NAME_ERR:
Rules of login name
1. Allow 0~9 A~Z a~z
2. Allow special characters ! $ ( ) * + - . ; < = > @ [ ] ^ _ { } | ~
LANG.SETTING_PLANET_NETWORK_ERR:
1. 6~16 characters
2. Only ASCII A~Z, a~z, 0~9, minus sign (-)
3. The last character must not be a minus sign
4. The first character is allowed to be either a letter or a digit
